tldr: Guest: Shay Brog (Burt) brings a sell-side view on who’s buying in retail/commerce media.
Frameworks: packaging inventory + data, aligning incentives across publisher/retailer/brand.
Contrarian: The open web’s sellers still hold unique signals if packaged correctly.
learn: How sellers structure deals and what buyers actually value right now.
Signals that matter for measurement and renewal.
Where brand-direct vs. agency motion is shifting.
takeaways: Hiring: hybrids who speak publisher, retailer, and performance.

faq.a: Shay Brog from Burt with a sell-side vantage point.
Hands-on experience packaging inventory and data for buyers that renew.
Clarify value props; map signal → KPI; package measurement up-front.
